markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Gendowyn (Lady of the Fangwood)](/Deities.aspx?ID=152)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 56, [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

The fey queen Gendowyn might seem an unusual divine patron for the Knights of Lastwall, but it makes perfect sense to her devotees. Gendowyn is a living manifestation and representation of the natural world, a world in which the undead simply have no place. While her personal morality represents the inscrutable whims and caprices of the First World from which she hails, she recognizes the aligned goals she shares with her knightly followers and bestows her divine blessings upon them in turn.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Preserve primal areas, destroy blighted fey and agents of Cyth V'sug, protect those who placate you with offerings

**Anathema** Parley or make a deal with fiends, forgive those who deceive you, harm an innocent child

**Area of Concern**
Fangwood Forest

**Follower Alignments**
N, CG, CN, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

**Favored Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)

**Domains** [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=10), [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11), [Luck](/Domains.aspx?ID=18), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Summon Fey](/Spells.aspx?ID=322)

- **2nd**
[Barkskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=20)

- **5th**
[Tree Stride](/Spells.aspx?ID=343)

</column>
name: Gendowyn (Lady of the Fangwood)
